logistic.R: Untracked Metaquest system risks: stale compass, unsynchronised map, missing telemetry exports, or activation-matrix drift.
logistic.Theta: docs/metaquest_parity_brief.md + seed/codexfeedback.* (inkl. pr-draft-0110) carry matching mq-sys references within 24h.
logistic.zeta: Spikes when BreakPoint rituals lapse, sigillin_sync reports age beyond one sprint, or activation-matrix timestamps lag UTAC tracker.

alerts.risk: System directory index stale relative to parity brief or codex.
signals: metaquest_system_index.yaml updated timestamp older than docs/metaquest_parity_brief.md.
Latest codex entry with mq-sys scope missing reference to this index.
alerts.consequence: Automation teams lose Θ visibility; launch tasks proceed without documented parity.
mitigation: Freeze automation changes until index refreshed.
Update index + bridge, cite remediation in codex with shared timestamp.
Confirm UTAC status matrix (Metaquest handshake) mirrors the update.

guardrail.threshold: ≤24h delta vs parity brief + codex entry

alerts.risk: Telemetry exports missing from system lanterns.
signals: scripts/sigillin_sync.py has no logged run within one sprint.
Compass/map list different telemetry timestamps than bridge dashboard.
tests/test_sigillin_sync.py flagged by CI or skipped.
alerts.consequence: Codex cannot prove readiness; automation gating stalls or proceeds without evidence.
mitigation: Execute scripts/sigillin_sync.py report/stamp, propagate timestamp across lanterns and codex.
Document run id in this index and UTAC matrix.

alerts.risk: BreakPoint rituals absent from automation notes.
signals: Index or lantern MD lacks WayToGo/ReaktionWayToGo citations for newest automation tasks.
codex entry referencing mq-sys omits BreakPoint acknowledgement.
alerts.consequence: ζ(R) spikes during automation sprint; recovery scripts unclear.
mitigation: Trigger BreakPoint ritual, attach transcript to codex, update index + compass with references.
Notify bridge dashboard to re-synchronise rituals across campaign lane.

guardrail.threshold: Every new mq-sys codex entry references WayToGo + ReaktionWayToGo

alerts.risk: Activation matrix drift; bridge/index/compass fail to mirror August 2026 updates.
signals: metaquest_activation_matrix.yaml timestamp newer than metaquest_system_index.yaml or compass JSON.
docs/utac_v2_activation_tracker_2026-08.md cites codex id absent in light index.
Codex entry pr-draft-0110 missing from system index activation hooks.
alerts.consequence: Activation backlog invisible to system lane; mq-bridge-shadow-005 escalates late.
mitigation: Mirror activation-matrix timestamp + codex id across index, compass, UTAC tracker, and codex.
Log remediation in docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md and shadow compass.

guardrail.threshold: ≤1 sprint between activation matrix refresh and index update

recovery_hooks.name: Shadow parity refresh
steps: Review latest mq-sys codex entry and parity brief timestamps.
Update metaquest_system_index.* + compass/map with shared timestamp + codex id.

recovery_hooks.name: Telemetry audit
steps: Run scripts/sigillin_sync.py stamp with mq-sync id.
Verify tests/test_sigillin_sync.py executed in CI or locally.
Archive report path in codex entry + this index.

recovery_hooks.name: Lantern shelf alignment
steps: Inspect shadow lantern shelf entries for matching light-side references.
Ensure each lantern cites codex id + timestamp from latest mq-sys update.
Propagate findings to bridge dashboard and UTAC matrix.

recovery_hooks.name: Activation matrix parity sweep
steps: Compare timestamps across metaquest_activation_matrix.*, light index, compass, and UTAC tracker.
If drift detected, sync light/shadow entries and update codex with remediation notes referencing mq-sys-shadow-index-004.
Confirm docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md cites the refreshed codex id.

null_model.description: Null = Metaquest system lanterns evolve without shadow oversight; parity brief diverges, activation matrix drifts, telemetry fades, and automation overshoots.

monitoring.condition: Every mq-sys codex entry lists this index and shadow compass.
Bridge dashboard + system lanterns share timestamp/codex id within one sprint.
Light index + compass update within one sprint of activation matrix refresh.
